short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Pop & Click to Call Integration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 360VoIP API Integration platform providing database driven screen pops. The App integrates with back-office applications using APIs. By leveraging APIs the extension will search any internal database and present the findings The App also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
